name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The accident resulted in one death and two injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The leading domestic voice APP "Banban" announced the closure of business due to the cross-border law enforcement of Shunde Public Security Bureau, which transferred 300 million yuan of funds.
On April 21, the leading domestic voice APP "Banban" issued a letter of closure, saying that due to the "distant-sea fishing" cross-border law enforcement of Shunde Public Security Bureau in Guangdong, 300 million yuan of funds in the company's account were transferred by Shunde Public Security Bureau, which made it impossible to continue business, and now had to announce the closure of operations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 21, Nanjing Hong Kong and China Gas Company responded to the surge in gas billing, but it seemed to have said nothing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In fact, as early as the beginning of this year, a Nanjing netizen continued to speak out online to expose the problem of random gas charges in Nanjing. But in the end, his account was blocked and he was banned from posting.
